name: Of Cows & Peasants
description:
This is my entry for LD43. Please play using the Windows version for the best experience. If playing in browser, make sure to not click out of the window.

Left click - launch Peasants
Right click - launch Cows

Tips:

  • Peasants are shot in pieces which means a larger area of affect.
  • The fewer peasants you have, the slower you will reload.
  • Cows are not as effective against small goblins, but they are the only things which can defeat the large goblins.
  • Cows cost 2 food, but they also generate 0.5 food per day.
  • Peasants cost 0.5 food, but are bought in pairs.
